TopicTitle: What They Found in my Head...

Articles.Content: What a roller coaster reading this thread was! How's the dizziness?

Sorry I havnt been back for a while.  Computer motherboard went out and just had my phone for 4 months until fixed.

Still dizzy and lightheaded.  Have little energy and have trouble focusing on things, but still have all my faculties (not that I had many to begin with).

On disability with no hearing or balance in my right ear.  Have to concentrate to do most complex movement past walking in a straight line.  Can still play KSP, so I call it a win!

> 
> 
> 4 hours ago, Fr8monkey said:

That's good, at least you have something fun to do!
I'm glad you're feeling better and hope you're doing physiotherapy.
